game.name: Apache City War
game.description:
The war has already begun and you as the bravest and most skilled soldier have to clear all the commando terrorists from your area. Hey boys! Do not take it easily since the helicopter is flying on the base of enemy and you will be killed shortly if you do not attack them timely. Grab your gun and be prepared to kill all your enemies right from your helicopter and keep your building that is captured by a horde of bad souls free in Apache City War!

Your helicopter cannot land so try to respond your enemies in the air. It is a time to become an elite sniper in this first-person shooting game. Use your helicopter wisely to fly over the city that is full of dangerous attackers! Keep your eyes and mind open and try to shoot them immediately when you see anyone out of them on a skyscraper! The more enemies you will kill, the better score you will be able to make in the end.

Be careful and try to shoot them without any errors otherwise your helicopter will be destroyed and you will get out of the game! Focus only how to protect your city from the killers in this one of the coolest 3D FPS shooters for boys! You have to survive not only for you, but many other families who trust on your intense fighting abilities. Remove all the enemies and become the biggest fighter of this planet in this gun simulator and have fun for free without download!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Apache City War at atmegame.com ! We have selected this  games for best excitement and thrill in you!
